揫字的基本解释

揫
jiū
聚集：“揫敛九薮之动物。”
束。
细小。
固。
古通“揪”：“忍终教束手囹圄，急提防劈面揫拖。”

揫字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiū］
［《廣韻》即由切，平尤，精。］
“愁3”的被通假字。
(1)收敛；聚集。
(2)抓扭。
(3)结；束。

揫字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　揫； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页444第02
【唐韻】【正韻】卽由切【集韻】【韻會】將由切，?音啾。【說文】本作?。束也。【增韻】斂也。【禮·鄉飲·酒義秋之爲言愁也註】愁讀爲揫。揫，斂也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】聚也。【馬融·廣成頌】揫斂九藪之動物。　又【集韻】字秋切，音遒。亦聚也。【說文】引《詩》百祿是揫。今詩作遒。　又【揚子·方言】細也。斂物而細謂之揫。　又【前漢·律歷志】作?。別見韋部。　又【韻會】【正韻】揫，或作愁。引鄕飲酒義。○按愁有揫音。非揫與愁通也。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　揫; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 444 02
【Tang Yun】【Zheng Yun】卽youqie【Jiyun】【Yunhui】will youqie,? Yinchi. [Said the text] This work?. Beam also. [Zeng Yun] Lian Ye. [Ritual, rural drinking, wine and autumn are also note for speech sorrow] sorrow is read as 揫. Snap, grabbing also.　[Erya·Shi Xie] Ju Ye. 【Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Grabbing the nine serval animals.　[Jiyun] The word autumn cuts, and the sound is 遒. Also together. [Said the text] Bailu quoted from "Poetry" is 揫. Today's poem is written.　[Yangtze Dialect] Fine. Converge objects and finely call it snapping.　[Previous Han·Lüzhi] Composed again. Don't see Wei Department.　[Yunhui] [Zhengyun] 揫, or worry. The righteousness of drinking wine. ○There is a snapping sound when you press worry. Non-sweeping and worrying.
